https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vrMcn6CKrLjWAtHHMFL7cj8A5au.jpg Three short tales of supernatural horror. In “The Telephone,” a woman is plagued by threatening phone calls. In "The Wurdalak,” a family is preyed upon by vampiric monsters. In “The Drop of Water,” a deceased medium wreaks havoc on the living. Black Sabbath
